creator: mishabearliu@msn.com
text:
I'm using Tomcat 4.1.27. JDBCRealm works fine, but DatasourceRealm does not 
work. Unpacking jakarta-tomcat-4.1.27-src.tar.gz, in file mbeans-
descriptors.xml, nothing about DatasourceRealm can be found.

Created attachment 9012
Patch against 4.1.29 version of mbean-descriptors.xml (catalina.jar) to add DataSourceRealm
creator: kylev@yaga.com
sfzhi@yahoo.com
text: See also bug 22202. The solution is obvious, but it looks like someone doesn't want it to be applied to the Tomcat distribution.
